#summary HIVE Wiki Welcome page

= What is HIVE? =

HIVE is a framework and service for the integration of multiple controlled vocabularies and thesauri using Simple Knowledge Organization (SKOS) format. 

HIVE features can be used in three ways:
 * [AboutHiveWeb HIVE Web]: GWT-based web application
 * [AboutHiveCore Core API]: Java SE API for programmatic access
 * [AboutHiveRestService REST Service]: REST-based service for programmatic access

HIVE supports the following functions:
 * Conversion of various vocabularies to SKOS
 * Browsing and searching SKOS vocabularies (Concept Browser)
 * Automatic controlled indexing using [http://www.nzdl.org/Kea/ KEA++], [https://code.google.com/p/maui-indexer/ Maui], and simple Lucene-based indexers.
